scripts.refresh: yarn console Dummy refresh-all && yarn console Dummy generate
scripts.bandit: yarn cdl rest && yarn quick-refresh && yarn cdl w e-skeleton_pants,vampire_bow 1 && yarn cdl w f-bandit_lizard
scripts.imp: yarn cdl rest && yarn cdl w e-serpent_skin_legs_armor,skull_wand 1 && yarn cdl w f-imp
scripts.pp-bank: yarn pp rest && yarn pp db 1
scripts.magic: yarn bob rest && yarn quick-refresh && yarn bob w e-iron_axe 1 && yarn bob w g-magic_wood
scripts.bob-fight: yarn bob w e-skull_staff 1 && yarn bob w f-ogre
scripts.bb-fishing: yarn bb rest && yarn bb w e-wolf_ears,spruce_fishing_rod 1 && yarn bb w gc-cooked_salmon
scripts.bb-fight: yarn bob w e-piggy_helmet,skull_staff 1 && yarn bob f-pig
